conbody.p: The installation of Design Studio does not make changes to your computer that require administrator level permission, so normally the User Account Control will not complain.
You can disable UAC or change the notification level, but be warned it will lead to a less secure system.

Here are the steps to follow:
Open the control panel
Type "UAC" into the search box.You'll see a link for "Change User Account Control Settings"
Click on link "Change User Account Control Settings
Change the level of notification
